title: Name Change Question
body: I just had a random thought. There is a time limit for how long an inactive account's name lasts before it becomes up for grabs right? So what about the people who get perm banned like bots and scripters, do their names get automatically released or do we have to wait the year and a half or whatever to take their name

replies.body: All names are impacted by the [summoner name clean up](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-), even banned accounts.  :D  You'll have to wait for the name to release.
